summary: Based on the actual events of one of the most horrific cases of child abuse ever to be documented, this haunting drama tells the tale of a young girl that was locked in a room for over 12 years.
cast: Melissa Errico|Joe Regalbuto|Sean Young|Michael Lerner|Kim Darby|Tarra Steele|Laurie O'Brien|Ed Brigadier|Sharon Madden|Jack Betts|Ben Messmer|Lora Anne Criswell|Michael Azria|Josh Boyd|Bryn Larsen|John Valdetero|Timi Prulhiere|Con Schell|Billy Maddox|Sara Van Horn|B.J. Ward|Kristine Oller|Luise Heath|Rachel Grate|Bill Pugin|Nellie Sciutto|Sanders Camp|Vito D'Ambrosio|Frederick Bailey|Biff Wiff|Paul Morgan Fredrix|Sharlene Ross|Adeline Allen|Sean Unruh|Daryl Haney|Barbara Pilavin|Burke Roberts|Sadie Rose Grayford
keywords: 1970s|year 1970|13 year old|13 year old girl|feral child
director: Director: Harry Bromley Davenport (as Harry Bromley-Davenport)
title: Mockingbird Don't Sing
